Html:
Just thought this was interesting, jabref automatically converts jabref/bibtex databases to xml outputs.
More info on this here:
http://www.paulkiddie.com/2009/07/jabref-exports-to-word-2007-xml/
Qiqqa (http://www.qiqqa.com) also does this.  It will convert BibTeX chunks (e.g. from GoogleScholar) into XML that Word2007/2010 understands.
